chapters.description: Overview of HTML, CSS, and how they work together to build web pages.

chapters.title: HTML Basics
chapters.description: Learn the structure of HTML documents and essential elements.

chapters.description: How to create forms for user input.

lessons.title: Text Inputs, Passwords, and Text Areas
Checkboxes, Radio Buttons, and Select Menus

chapters.title: CSS Basics
chapters.description: The fundamentals of CSS styling and how to apply it to HTML elements.

lessons.title: Using Inline, Internal, and External CSS

chapters.title: CSS Box Model
chapters.description: Understand the box model and how it affects layout.

chapters.title: Layout and Positioning
chapters.description: Learn to arrange elements using CSS layouts.

lessons.title: Position: Static, Relative, Absolute, and Fixed

chapters.title: Responsive Design
chapters.description: Learn techniques for building mobile-friendly websites.

chapters.title: Project: Build a Personal Portfolio
chapters.description: Apply what you've learned by building a simple portfolio website.

learningOutcomes: Understand the fundamentals of HTML and CSS.
Be able to structure a basic web page using HTML.
Apply CSS to style web pages effectively.
Build and publish a simple, responsive website.
